Verses: 1 agirippaa Pavulai Nokki: Nee Unakkaagap Pesa Unakku Uththaravaagiradhu Endraan. Appozhudhu Pavul Kaiyai Neetti, Thanakkaaga Uththaravu Sollaththodanginaan.
2 agirippaa Raajaave, Yoodhargal Enmel Saattugira Sagala Kaariyangalaikkuriththum Naan Indraikku Umakku Munbaaga Uththaravu Sollappogirapadiyinaale Ennaip Baakkiyavaan Endrennugiren.
3 viseshamaai Neer Yoodharudaiya Sagala Muraimaigalaiyum Tharkkangalaiyum Arindhavaraanadhaal Appadi Ennugiren; Aagaiyaal Naan Solvadhaip Porumaiyode Ketkumpadi Ummai Vendikkollugiren.
4 naan En Siruvayadhumudharkondu, Erusalemile En Janaththaarukkulle Irundhapadiyaal, Aadhimudhal Naan Nadandha Nadakkaiyai Yoodharellaarum Arindhirukkiraargal.
5 nammudaiya Maarkkaththilulla Samayapedhangalil Migavum Kandippaana Samayaththukku Isaindhapadi Pariseyanaai Nadandhenendru Saatchisolla Avargalukku Manadhirundhaal Sollalaam.
6 dhevan Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Arulichseydha Vaakkuththaththam Niraiverumengira Nambikkaikkaagave Naan Ippozhudhu Niyaayaththeerppadaigiravanaai Nirkiren.

7 iravum Pagalum Idaividaamal Aaraadhanai Seydhuvarugira Nammudaiya Pannirandu Koththiraththaarum Andha Vaakkuththaththam Niraiverumendru Nambiyirukkiraargal. Agirippaa Raajaave, Andha Nambikkaiyinimiththame Yoodhargal Enmel Kutranjaattugiraargal.
8 dhevan Mariththorai Ezhuppugiradhu Nambappadaadha Kaariyamendru Neengal Ennugiradhenna?
9 munne Naanum Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvin Naamaththirku Virodhamaai Anega Kaariyangalai Nadappikkavendumendru Ninaiththirundhen.

10 appadiye Naan Erusalemilum Seydhen. Naan Piradhaana Aasaariyargalidaththil Adhigaaram Petru, Parisuththavaangalil Anegaraich Siraichchaalaigalil Adaiththen; Avargal Kolai Seyyappadugaiyil Naanum Sammadhiththirundhen.

11 sagala Jebaaalayangalilum Naan Avargalai Anegandharam Dhandiththu, Dhevadhooshananj Sollak Kattaayappaduththinen; Avargalperil Moorkkaveri Kondavanaai Anniyapattanangal Varaikkum Avargalaith Thunbappaduththinen.
12 ippadich Seydhuvarugaiyil, Naan Piradhaana Aasaariyargalidaththil Adhigaaramum Uththaravum Petru, Thamaskuvukkup Pogumbodhu,
13 maththiyaana Velaiyil, Raajaave, Naan Vazhiyile Sooriyanudaiya Piragaasaththilum Adhigamaana Oli Vaanaththilirundhu Ennaiyum Ennudanekoodap Pirayaanampanninavargalaiyum Sutrip Piragaasikkakkanden.

14 naangalellaarum Tharaiyile Vizhundhabodhu: Savule, Savule, Nee En Ennaith Thunbappaduththugiraai? Mullil Udhaikkiradhu Unakkuk Kadinamaamendru Ebireyu Baashaiyile Ennudane Sollugira Oru Saththaththaik Ketten.
15 appozhudhu Naan: Aandavare, Neer Yaar Endren. Adharku Avar: Nee Thunbappaduththugira Yesu Naane.

16 ippozhudhu Nee Ezhundhu, Kaaloondri Nil. Nee Kandavaigalaiyum Naan Unakkuth Dharisanamaakik Kaanbikkappogiravaigalaiyum Kuriththu Unnai Oozhiyakkaaranaagavum Saatchiyaagavum Erpaduththugiradharkaaga Unakkuth Dharisanamaanen.
17 un Suyajanaththaaridaththinindrum Anniya Janaththaaridaththinindrum Unnai Vidudhalaiyaakki,

18 avargal Ennaip Patrum Visuvaasaththinaale Paavamannippaiyum Parisuththamaakkappattavargalukkuriya Sudhandharaththaiyum Petrukkollumpadiyaaga, Avargal Irulaivittu Oliyinidaththirkum, Saaththaanudaiya Adhigaaraththaivittu Dhevanidaththirkum Thirumbumpadikku Nee Avargaludaiya Kangalaith Thirakkumporuttu, Ippozhudhu Unnai Avargalidaththirku Anuppugiren Endraar.
19 aagaiyaal, Agirippaa Raajaave Naan Andhap Paramadharisanaththukkuk Keezhppadiyaadhavanaayirukkavillai.

20 munbu Thamaskuvilum Erusalemilum Yoodheyaa Dhesamengumullavargalidaththilum, Pinbu Purajaadhiyaaridaththilum Naan Poi, Avargal Dhevanidaththirku Mananthirumbik Gunappadavum, Mananthirumbudhalukketra Kiriyaigalaich Seyyavum Vendumendru Ariviththen.
21 idhinimiththame Yoodhargal Dhevaalayaththile Ennaip Pidiththuk Kolaiseyyap Pirayaththanampanninaargal.
22 aanaalum Dheva Anukkiragam Petru, Naan Innaalvaraikkum Siriyorukkum Periyorukkum Saatchikoori Varugiren.

23 theerkkadharisigalum Moseyum Munname Solliyirundhapadiye, Kiristhu Paadupadavendiyadhendrum, Mariththor Uyirththezhudhalil Avar Mudhalvaraagi, Suyajanangalukkum Anniya Janangalukkum Oliyai Velippaduththugiravarendrum Sollugireneyandri, Verondraiyum Naan Sollugiradhillai Endraan.
24 ivvidhamaai Avan Thanakkaaga Uththaravu Sollugaiyil, Pesdhu Uraththa Saththamaai: Pavule, Nee Pidhatrugiraai, Adhigakkalvi Unakkup Payiththiyamundaakkugiradhu Endraan.
25 adharku Avan: Ganamporundhiya Pesthuve, Naan Payiththiyakkaaranalla, Saththiyamum Sosthapuththiyumulla Vaarththaigalaip Pesugiren.

26 indhach Sangadhigalai Raajaa Arindhirukkiraar; Aagaiyaal Dhairiyamaai Avarukku Munbaagap Pesugiren; Ivaigalil Ondrum Avarukku Maraivaanadhallavendru Ennugiren; Idhu Oru Moolaiyile Nadandha Kaariyamalla.
27 agirippaa Raajaave, Theerkkadharisigalai Visuvaasikkireeraa? Visuvaasikkireerendru Ariven Endraan.
28 appozhudhu Agirippaa Pavulai Nokki: Naan Kiristhavanaagiradharkuk Konjankuraiya Nee Ennaich Sammadhikkappannugiraai Endraan.

29 adharkup Pavul: Neer Maaththiramalla, Indru En Vasanaththaik Ketkira Yaavarum, Konjankuraiyamaaththiram Alla, Indhak Kattugal Thavira, Muzhuvadhum Ennaippolaagumpadi Dhevanai Vendikkollugiren Endraan.
30 ivaigalai Avan Sonnabodhu, Raajaavum Dhesaadhibadhiyum Perneekkeyaalum Avargaludanekooda Utkaarndhirundhavargalum Ezhundhu,
31 thaniye Poi: Indha Manushan Maranaththukkaavadhu Kattugalukkaavadhu Paaththiramaanadhondraiyum Seyyavillaiyendru Thangalukkulle Pesikkondaargal.
32 agirippaa Pesthuvai Nokki: Indha Manushan Raayanukku Abayamidaadhirundhaanaanaal, Ivanai Vidudhalaipannalaagum Endraan.
